intro: Trachydium forrestii, commonly known as the Forster's trachydium, is a rare and unique species of flowering plant native to the high altitudes of the Eastern Arc Mountains in Tanzania. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its distinctive yellow flowers and hairy foliage.
